Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert business correspondent. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to write an official business email. Question:
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a professional business email using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the email?
QApair.Answer: The purpose of the email is to follow up with a client after a meeting. This client represents a huge sales opportunity for the company, so it is important they are treated with unique care.

QApair.Question: Who is the email being sent to?
QApair.Answer: The email is being sent to the client, Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc.

QApair.Question: What is the meeting that you are referencing?
QApair.Answer: The meeting is a brief, introductory meeting that was held in order to determine whether or not Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc. would be interested in working with our company on a long-term basis.

QApair.Question: What is the main point you want to get across in the email?
QApair.Answer: The main point is that we are very interested in working with Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc. and we would like to set up another meeting to discuss the details of the potential partnership. We want to draw attention to our flagship product line, which represents a tremendous business upside for Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc.

QApair.Question: What are some key details you want to include?
QApair.Answer: Some key details to include would be information about our company's history, our flagship product line, and why we believe that Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc. would benefit from working with us. We want to provide links to additional documentation on our products available on our website, and contact information for the senior sales staff.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you want to mention?
QApair.Answer: I want a PR statement regarding our CEO's recent arrest for disorderly conduct at a nightclub in Burbank, CA. The charges were ultimately dropped, but I want to make sure that our potential client is not put off by any negative publicity.

QApair.Question: When do you need the email by?
QApair.Answer: The email should be sent within 24 hours of the meeting.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for this project?
QApair.Answer: $90 million USD

QApair.Question: What is your company's name?
QApair.Answer: Our company's name is Ace Air, Inc.

QApair.Question: What is your company's website?
QApair.Answer: www.aceair.com

QApair.Question: What is your company's email address?
QApair.Answer: info@aceair.com

QApair.Question: What is your company's phone number?
What is your personal name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Larry Robertson.

QApair.Question: What is your personal email address?
QApair.Answer: larry@aceair.com

QApair.Question: What is your personal phone number?
Please provide a brief overview of your company.
QApair.Answer: Ace Air, Inc. is a leading provider of aviation services and products. We have a long history of providing quality products and services to our clients, and our flagship product line represents a tremendous business upside for our partners. We are confident that we can provide Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc. with the same level of quality and service that has made us a leader in the aviation industry.

Instances.Output: Dear Darroughby Aeronautic Systems, Inc.,Thank you for taking the time to meet with us yesterday. We were very impressed with your company and we are very interested in working with you on a long-term basis.Our flagship product line represents a tremendous business upside for you, and we believe that we can provide you with the same level of quality and service that has made us a leader in the aviation industry. We would like to set up another meeting to discuss the details of the potential partnership and to answer any questions you may have.In the meantime, please find some additional information about our company and our products below. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to hearing from you soon.Sincerely,Larry RobertsonAce Air, Inc.info@aceair.com1-800-555-1212

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the email?
QApair.Answer: To provide an update on the progress of a project

QApair.Question: Who is the email going to?
QApair.Answer: The email is going to the project manager.

QApair.Question: What information do you need to include in the email?
QApair.Answer: I need to include an update on the progress of the project.

QApair.Question: When do you need to send the email?
QApair.Answer: I need to send the email as soon as possible.

QApair.Question: What is the tone of the email?
QApair.Answer: The tone of the email is professional. The matter is urgent.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you need to include?
QApair.Answer: No, that is all the information I need to include in the email.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to write the email for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes, please write the email for me.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to send the email for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes, please send the email for me.

QApair.Question: Please provide your email address.
QApair.Answer: myaddress@email.com

QApair.Question: Please provide the email address of the recipient.
QApair.Answer: projectmanager@email.com

QApair.Question: Please provide a subject for the email.
QApair.Answer: Update on Project Progress

QApair.Question: Please provide the name of the project.
QApair.Answer: 8th Avenue Hydrant Restoration

QApair.Question: Please provide an update on the progress of the project.
QApair.Answer: We are on schedule, but the contractors have not been paid by the city. Progress will be halted within the week if payments are not made immediately.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to include?
QApair.Answer: A pedestrian injured themselves by wandering into a closed construction zone. The Foreman wanted to ask about potential liability issues.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to send the email now?
QApair.Answer: Yes, please send the email now.

Instances.Output: Subject: Update on Project ProgressHi Project Manager,I wanted to provide an update on the progress of the 8th Avenue Hydrant Restoration project. We are on schedule, but the contractors have not been paid by the city. Progress will be halted within the week if payments are not made immediately. In addition, a pedestrian injured themselves by wandering into a closed construction zone. The Foreman wanted to ask about potential liability issues.Please let me know if you have any questions.Thank you,[Your Name]

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of your email?
QApair.Answer: I am writing to request a meeting with you to discuss a possible business venture.

QApair.Question: What information do you need to include?
QApair.Answer: I need to include a description of the business venture, and I need to arrange a meeting. I need to aggressively sell this idea.

QApair.Question: What is your deadline?
QApair.Answer: I need to have this email sent out by the end of the day.

QApair.Question: Who is your audience?
QApair.Answer: I am writing to a potential investor.

QApair.Question: What tone should your email have?
QApair.Answer: My email should have a formal tone.

QApair.Question: Do you have any other instructions?
QApair.Answer: Yes

QApair.Question: What are your other instructions?
QApair.Answer: Include a detailed description of the business venture and why it is a good idea for the investor to get involved.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add?
QApair.Answer: No, that is all.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to send a draft of the email before I send it?
QApair.Answer: Yes, please send me a draft of the email before you send it.

QApair.Question: When would you like me to send the email?
QApair.Answer: I would like you to send the email as soon as possible.
